title: !The Black Bloc, !MISQOT release
content:
!Exclamachine Type Foundry has released two new OpenType fonts for mass consumption; _!The Black Bloc_ and _!MISQOT_. Both typefaces are free for personal or commercial use. Both fonts are previewable and downloadable over at [http://www.exclamachine.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417051156/http:/www.exclamachine.com/ "http://www.exclamachine.com")

The blackletter-inspired modern serifed titling font "!The Black Bloc" features over 200 glyphs, including full european support and plenty of symbols. Available in a single download with regular, bold, italic and bold italic.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417051156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/black-bloc-promo_4077.jpg)
"

!MISQOT", A tangled, chunky decorative font with a 'slivered' look is also now available. This font features a full standard character set and extra symbols as well as a small accented character set. Available in regular, demibold and heavy styles.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417051156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/misqot_4309.jpg)
author: Choz Cunningham
